headline: FGI Industries Ltd. (FGI) Reports Q2 Loss, Lags Revenue Estimates
summary: FGI Industries (FGI) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -100.00% and -4.62%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Plug Power Second Quarter 2025 Highlights
summary: • Execution on Project Quantum Leap helps accelerate business salesgrowth and financial performance• Q2 revenue up 21% year-over-year, driven by broad hydrogen demand LATHAM, N.Y., Aug. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Plug Power Inc. (NASDAQ: PLUG), a global leader in comprehensive hydrogen solutions for the hydrogen economy, today announced its financial results and operational milestones for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025.
